ai.summary: An easy, 1.5 km urban section of the Capital Ring (Section 12) offered as an alternative route. Suitable for a short, leisurely stroll through parks and city streets within the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently rolling urban paths, park trails and pavements. Mix of smooth tarmac and compact gravel; occasional curb crossings and uneven surfaces near park edges.
ai.safety_notes: This is an urban hike. Stay on marked paths, use sidewalks where required, and be aware of traffic, cyclists, and pedestrians. Keep valuables secure, plan for crowded areas, and carry a map or offline route. Check for road closures or park restrictions before starting.
recommended_gear: Map or offline route on phone
Phone with charged battery and ID
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; best in spring and autumn when temperatures are mild and daylight is favorable.

seo.title: Capital Ring Section 12 (Alternative) — Easy 1.5 km UK City Walk
seo.meta_description: Explore Capital Ring Section 12 (Alternative), a short and easy 1.5 km urban hike in the UK. Route highlights, terrain, safety tips, gear suggestions, and ideal seasons.
